Subject: Transfer Limit Event
Description: One of our admins is getting emails about a reached Transfer limit. I can't find the specific setting in the EP console where I can see this Alert and how to check which files were transfered
What_We_Know__c:
- the customer is receiving Transfer limit reached emails even tho they haven't set up an alert for this
- I informed them since it's enabled directly in the Transfer limit section, this is the intended behaviour and it's sent out to all admins
Solution_Comment__c: information regarding transfer limit reports and alerts provided to the customer
Account_Name__c: KEURO Besitz GmbH & Co. EDV-Dienstleistungs KG
